Woman helped partner suffering from dementia change will so it was in her favour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-helped-her-partner-suffering-from-dementia-change-his-will-so-it-was-in-her-favour/VNDJ7L7A7BDUHD6MTB2PJ4EHYY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-helped-her-partner-suffering-from-dementia-change-his-will-so-it-was-in-her-favour/VNDJ7L7A7BDUHD6MTB2PJ4EHYY/ Jeremy WilkinsonThe alterations, made when he had dementia, meant less went to his three daughters.
